column1: Little Goat Diner////Took us to a booth for two
column2: but directly across from us were larger booths that could seat 4
column3: but each one had only two patrons
column4: so as we are not petite gals and would have appreciated being accommodated
column5: I asked for the larger booth.  Oh no
column7: we are setting this booth for 4 people who were waiting.  Ok
column9: certainly could understand that.....but within the next minute
column10: they seated two young gals there.  We weren't trendy enough for their clientele?..Come on!  I was appalled at that point!
